Allergy & Sensitivity Testing + Remedies

It is often the case that it is what we eat rather than how much that affects how we feel, and even how much weight is gained. Allergies are the body’s natural reaction to the wrong type of food or medicine. More subtle sensitivities, individual to us all, may not manifest themselves so obviously, but still leave us wondering why we feel lethargic or cannot seem to lose weight despite dieting. An allergy/sensitivity test can reveal which foods or substances may be causing health or weight problems. A range of remedies are available to treat most conditions. All cases are treated individually. Use the contact fields below to ask Face and Figure how we can treat you today.

Facials

Face and figure salon only invests  in high technology and non-invasive facial treatments. We offer facials for acne, pigment, peeling, wrinkles and toning (anti-aging). We were the first in to introduce a non-surgical treatment around Taunton. One facial can reduce the appearance by up to 5 years.

Hair-Removal

We offer waxing, electrolysis and Epil Pro. Electrolysis has been used to decades for countering roots, but takes time to treat . Epil Pro uses high frequency sound to destroy the hair shaft without harming the skin.

Make-Up

We offer lessons and make-up for special occasions using 100% chemical free make-up. We sell a wide variety of make-up with a good shelf life so they are very economical to use. All our make-up are mineral based so they can actually improve the skin rather than aggravate it.
